Class FlappyWorld

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      FlappyWorld

public class FlappyWorld
extends greenfoot.World

FlappyWorld class which creates world for Flappy, pipes, and scoreboard to coexist.

Version:
2014
Author:
Ahrenn Sivananthan

Constructor Summary
FlappyWorld()
          Constructor that initializes FlappyWorld, and adds Flappy, the ground, and score object for each digit.

Method Detail

act

public void act()
Method that increases a counter to determine when the next pipe should be generated. Also increases score by 1 everytime a pipe is passed.
